name: Through the Eye of Innocence Game Jam Demo
name_original: Through the Eye of Innocence Game Jam Demo
description:
[WARNING: NOT FOR THE EASILY DISTURBED OR FAINT OF HEART]

A short demo for Through the Eye of Innocence, made for the "My First Game Jam" event.

Control using A and D, Space, and Arrow keys.
Yes, I know I said W and D in game. No, I'm not going to change it.

Credits for open source sounds:

"Ambience, Creepy Wind, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
"Something Evil Approaches, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
"Serithi_Creepy" by Serithi of Freesound.org
"World of the Damned Souls" by Spectre_of_Pain of Freesound.org
